resources.string: The username is invalid. It should be 4–48 characters long and it can\'t contain whitespace characters.
The password is invalid. It should be 4–64 characters long and it shouldn\'t be a simple sequence like 1234.
This username is already taken by someone
"This is your account. You can store some text" "here. It will only be accessible to you and to no one else."
The text you type here will be saved in your account and restored when you log out and in again
